data.name: Dynalist Clean - Dark
data.description: Write with better readability. - This style increases readability with subtle improvements on typography and layout. - Please use the style with "Theme: Dark" (Settings > Preferences). Need a daytime style? Check out Dynalist Clean - Light. If you find the style useful, you could buy me a coffee.

data.name: Dynalist Clean - Light
data.description: Write with better readability. - This style increases readability with subtle improvements on typography and layout. - Please use the style with "Theme: Default" or "Theme: Sepia" (Settings > Preferences). Need a nighttime style? Check out Dynalist Clean - Dark. If you find the style useful, you could buy me a coffee. <3

data.name: Roblox 2016 Theme Work In Progress
data.description:
If you played Roblox in 2016 you may like this. 

3/8/20
Added support for BTR users that like to keep the sidebar open and added support for page zoomed out further than 100%
